name: Alitheia
domains: Goddess of Truth, Sight, and Divination
worshippers: Divination wizards. Seekers of Truth. Investigators
appearance: A large woman in a white dress with a gold headband covering her eyes.
tenets: root out lies and corruption wherever it is found.
Always strive to be your best possible self.
parents: 3rd Generation, born of Fanome and Nera
lore: None can lie within her presence. She isnâ€™t very powerful on her own, but is able to exploit any weakness you have, and foil any schemes you attempt to create. She is able to conjure alternate versions of people to have them fight better versions of themselves.
